p: This instance uses modified subset of Mutant Standard emoji called MUT4NT ST4ND4RD, both of which are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

This instance uses Mutant Standard emoji, which are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License. This instance also uses MUT4NT ST4ND4RD Emoji, a modified subset of the Mutant Standard emoji, which are also provided under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.
